hidden:
How many <C> faces are currently hidden from the camera?
Answer with a single integer.
max_hidden:
Out of the faces currently hidden from the
camera, which color appears most often?
Answer with only the color name.
match:
Which cube matches the one shown in the video?
Answer with one multiple choice option.
roll:
Which color was rolled most often?
Answer with only the color name.
n_roll:
How many times was <C> rolled in total?
Answer with a single integer.
fold:
Which cube net folds into the cube shown in the video?
Answer with one multiple choice option.
